com.mapzen.android.search

Class MapzenSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.android.search.MapzenSearch

  • public class MapzenSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main class for interaction with the Mapzen search api.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapzenSearch(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a new MapzenSearch with api key set from mapzen.xml.
      MapzenSearch(android.content.Context context, Pelias pelias)
      Creates a new MapzenSearch with the Pelias object used for underlying search/autocomplete queries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Return the underlying Pelias object.
      void place(java.lang.String gid, <any> callback)
      Issues a place request for a given global identifier.
      void reverse(double lat, double lon, <any> callback)
      Issues a reverse geocode request given the lat/lon.
      void search(java.lang.String query, <any> callback)
      Requests search results given a query.
      void search(java.lang.String query, BoundingBox box, <any> callback)
      Requests search results given a query.
      void search(java.lang.String query, double lat, double lon, <any> callback)
      Requests search results given a query.
      void setHttpHandler(MapzenSearchHttpHandler handler)
      Sets the router's http handler for adding custom headers and parameters to requests.
      void setLocationProvider(PeliasLocationProvider locationProvider)
      Set a location provider to be used in search and suggest requests.
      void suggest(java.lang.String query, <any> callback)
      Returns autocomplete suggestions given a query string.
      void suggest(java.lang.String query, double lat, double lon, <any> callback)
      Requests autocomplete suggestions given a query and lat/lon.

    • Method Detail

      • suggest

        public void suggest(java.lang.String query,
                    <any> callback)
        Returns autocomplete suggestions given a query string. The query will use the PeliasLocationProvider to retrieve a lat/lon to use as a focus point for the request. The callback will be notified upon success or failure of query.
        Parameters:
        query -
        callback -

      • suggest

        public void suggest(java.lang.String query,
                    double lat,
                    double lon,
                    <any> callback)
        Requests autocomplete suggestions given a query and lat/lon. The lat/lon is used as a focus point for results The callback will be notified upon success or failure of the query.
        Parameters:
        query -
        callback -

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String query,
                   <any> callback)
        Requests search results given a query. The PeliasLocationProvider will be used to generate a bounding box for results. The callback will be notified upon success or failure of the query.
        Parameters:
        query -
        callback -

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String query,
                   BoundingBox box,
                   <any> callback)
        Requests search results given a query. The BoundingBox will be used to generate relevant results. The callback will be notified upon success or failure of the query.
        Parameters:
        query -
        callback -

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String query,
                   double lat,
                   double lon,
                   <any> callback)
        Requests search results given a query. The lat/lon will be used as a focus point to generate relevant results. The callback will be notified upon success or failure of the query.
        Parameters:
        query -
        callback -

      • reverse

        public void reverse(double lat,
                    double lon,
                    <any> callback)
        Issues a reverse geocode request given the lat/lon. The callback will be notified upon success or failure of the query.
        Parameters:
        lat -
        lon -
        callback -

      • place

        public void place(java.lang.String gid,
                  <any> callback)
        Issues a place request for a given global identifier. The callback will be notified upon success or failure of the query.
        Parameters:
        gid -
        callback -

      • setLocationProvider

        public void setLocationProvider(PeliasLocationProvider locationProvider)
        Set a location provider to be used in search and suggest requests. This will be used to return more relevant results for given positions and areas
        Parameters:
        locationProvider -
